Reviews.Title: Great camera but poor accessories
Reviews.Author: Mike Adkins
Reviews.Content: The camera was everything I expected and more.  The problem I had was the accessories that came with it.  The camera bag was too small for the camera, and the cleaning solution came in a unsealed bottle that spilled all over my other products (No damage to the camera).

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck...but it's still just a P&S;
Reviews.Author: PC Friendly
Reviews.Content: This camera is a really good deal if you're looking for a "nice" Point and Shoot. However, realize that it is just that. Don't expect it to perform on par with DSLR cameras. The optical zoom is extremely impressive. The multi-shot is a little slow. It will suck down batteries if used in the GPS mode so buy a backup battery if you plan on going crazy with it. Make sure you buy a class 10 SDCard if you plan on using the HD Camcorder function. Otherwise, good features and control (Manual settings), menu, flash, etc.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Charles Hughes
Reviews.Content: Looked at every camera in price range before buying, I'm SUPER HAPPY, the pictures look fantastic!!!!!!!  It works in a few diffrent ways, it has a bunch of functions for people that know what they're doing, and then it has a automatic mode for beginners (THAT's ME!!!), I set it on automatic and take pictures and they look fantastic...  LOVE IT... LOVE IT.....  LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: beckydale4950
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great quality pictures. The zoom feature is incredible. The GPS feature is great for the traveler. I strongly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX260 HS bundle didn't quite live up to the description
Reviews.Author: Travel-bound
Reviews.Content: First let me say that I really like the camera. I have no issues with the camera itself. When we received the bundle I was a bit disappointed. The camera case is too small for the camera, and the two items that Amazon suggested as an add-on weren't the right products for my camera. Amazon suggested an additional battery and charger, so I took advantage as the savings were quite good. When they arrived, the battery is the wrong size for the camera so the battery charger was wrong too. The company that sold the battery charger was very nice when I informed them that there was a problem and they promptly credited by credit card and told me to not bother sending it back. The company who sold the battery didn't offer the same deal and I have to pay for shipping. Not sure I want to go through the hassle as the battery was $3.00.

Reviews.Title: gadolph
Reviews.Author: gado
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product grouping.  It's a great kit for any beginning or blossoming photographer.  Great camera with plenty of functions.  Kit helps with maintenance and functionality.  The product was delivered as advertised and in a very timely manner.  Definitely recommend seller for future purchases in this category.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX260 is great!
Reviews.Author: Armand Arce
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera for my son. He needed a camera with a video feature for school. His film looked really good! He's also taken allot of pictures of flowers in our landscaping - close up photos. We may frame some of them. The picture clarity is amazing. The only down side was with video taping - it does not adjust to lighting changes quickly, so his moving had to stop and start when the scene went from inside to outside and vise versa.

Reviews.Title: Happy so far
Reviews.Author: GrampaGrouse
Reviews.Content: I needed to get a better camera for vacations, something small and from what I have read this camera is a good choice. I have taken some pictures and they are a lot better than my old Olympus. The real test will be after I take it on vacation. Then I will get back to you and well see!

Reviews.Title: Little on the pricey side but a good solid camera
Reviews.Author: mhart210
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because several other reviews of other cameras suggested this as an alternative.  It was more than I wanted to spend on a point-and-shoot camera but after two vacations it has proven to be worth it.  The photos I have taken (close-ups of flower arraignments, landscapes/sunsets and groups of people) all came out very nice regardless of setting or lighting.  I'm no professional photographer and have no plans on publishing or blowing up these photos so they look fine to me.  The only major complaint I read on other reviews consistantly had to do with the location of the flash.  While I'll agree that it is placed in an inconvenient location (right below where your left index finger would rest on top of the camera) it is just that, an incovenience not a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: Manual
Reviews.Author: Hermes
Reviews.Content: The camera is good, but the manual is poor, is necessary more explanation for some points. I need look for Net to understand.

Reviews.Title: Love this Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: I love this compact Cannon camera.  Has excellent zoom for getting close up pics from far away.  I use it all the time and it takes great game pics for just the average camera buff.  Great color and very easy to operate.  Would highly recommend this camera for anyone, since it is so easy to operate.  Takes excellent videos also.  Just super easy to use in any situation.

Reviews.Title: It's A Winner
Reviews.Author: MtSiView
Reviews.Content: I was ready to replace my Canon A630 with something a little more up to date, and this filled the bill.  Admitedly, my familiarity with Canon made the learning curve short.  The one thing I was looking for was a longer zoom.  It has really made a difference when taking a long range landscape shot; you can crop the picture before you take it.  I really don't use a lot of the sophisticated features that these cameras offer, but little by little I am getting educated.  So far, I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: sprashfl
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Canon powershot SX260.Pros: The zoom is just amazing; accessories are good; tried the video in full HD and its great; camera modes are good;Cons: Little heavy; felt the battery drained out fast when I used the video mode; didn't know how to use GPS;Overall its a great camera if I don't want to carry my SLR. It fits in your pocket and has great MP and Zoom.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Sen Thi Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures! I've had it for about a year now and for a non professional photographer it works great.Some pros: automatic and fully manual settingsSeveral useful preset settings, the image stabilization for night time shooting works well I've been really impressed with this setting which gives you a sharp picture for night shots even without a tripodIt has a grid you can turn on and off so you can shoot straight pictures, that's usefulWhite balance settings work wellSmall and compactDurable, I dropped it (gasp) and it still works just fine the screen didn't crackEasy to use, intuitive menus and buttonsfairly wide angle for a point and shootCons:The color of bright colors aren't always true (floral pictures, sunsets)It no longer has the preset for a fast shutter (kids and pets)As you can see, overall, I am happy with this little camera. It takes beautiful pictures you can enlarge and frame without problems. The pictures are bright and colorful. The camera is as easy or as complicated as you want.

Reviews.Title: overall a good camera
Reviews.Author: Ankur
Reviews.Content: i didnt liked the case provided with this camera.Rest all is really goodGood zoom and other features at this pricethanks.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love
Reviews.Author: Donald Switzler "Poppie"
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite camera (1 of 4 Canon digital cameras).  The quick focus, 14X optical zoom, size and everything else makes this a great tool for taking pictures, even in dim light.  I have a Canon Rebel, Xsi, which is a fine camera, but the one that gets used more than the other 3 is the SX230 (which is not the same p/n listed above); however, that may be the package p/n for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Another replacement
Reviews.Author: Rookieracer
Reviews.Content: This is very nice camera, because of the superzoom. I have taken pics of the moon and they werent to bad.It does take nice photos of people, cars and landscape. Its not very user friendly why it come to adjustments, but does take good pics once it is setup.I bought this to replace the one that fell off my bike.

Reviews.Title: I do not like this camera
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: I would like a better quality higher performing camera. I hope I can exchange this camea for a better one

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 effective megapixels, 1/2.3-inch high-sensitivity CMOS
DIGIC 4 Image Processor improves shooting in low-light situations without the need for a flash
Full 1080p HD Video
3.0 in. Pure Color System LCD display with wide angle viewing
GPS tracker to record locations and logger to view locations
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full-HD Video (Black) Premiere Bundle Includes Camera , 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, and More.
